coordinate_convention: Relative directions: facing is relative to current orientation; CW/CCW are around the couple/center as stated; inside/outside refer to inner vs outer position in concentric-circle option or toward/away from center in single-circle option.

steps.direction: inward to face next couple (toward center/line of dance as applicable)
steps.notes: Original form: Cpl 1 moves in to face Cpl 2. Recreational concentric circles: no action; couples already facing; begin with vocal.

steps.amount: 4 running or scuff steps forward + 4 running or scuff steps back
8 walking steps CW (meas 5-6) + 8 walking steps CCW (meas 7-8)
steps.notes: Face partner; join both hands palm-to-palm (ML-WR and MR-WL); hands out about shoulder level; circle together.

steps.direction: pass left shoulder with opposite; then turn CW in place
steps.amount: 2 running steps to pass (cts 1-2) + 2 steps turning alone to R/CW (cts 3-4)

steps.notes: Pass L shoulder again with opposite; turn CW alone to face in.

steps.direction: CW then CCW with opposite person
steps.notes: Twirl as described for partner but with opposite; end in original place.

steps.direction: inside couples form arch; outside couples pass under; exchange places
steps.notes: Inside couples (closer to center/inner circle) join inside hands to form arch. Outside couples join hands and pass under arch to change places with inside couples. On last 2 steps: change hands and, turning toward partner, face back to original facing direction.

steps.part: Fig VI (Repeat arch with roles swapped)
steps.direction: original outside couples form arch; original inside couples pass under
steps.amount: repeat Fig V (8 running or scuff steps)

steps.part: Fig VIII (Partner twirl CCW with progression)
steps.direction: CCW with partner while progressing to next opposite couple
steps.amount: CCW twirl continuing through end of phrase (implied 8 steps across meas 7-8)
steps.notes: During CCW twirl, couples advance to face next couple per progression rules below.
Original form: after progressing on Fig VIII meas 7-8, Cpl 1 moves on to face Cpl 3; Cpl 2 remains in place.

steps.direction: to face next outer couple to their right
steps.notes: Inside couples gradually move to face next outside couple to their R during the CCW twirl/progression.

steps.direction: between inner and outer circles per endpoints
steps.notes: If a couple reaches end of inner circle: step into outer circle, face center, wait to be faced. If a couple reaches R end of outer circle: wait out 1 time through the dance; then on next progression move into inner circle. Repeat until music ends.

inferred_relations.notes: Primary working relationship is a couple facing an opposite couple (in open circle: adjacent along line; in concentric circles: inner couple faces an outer couple).
W is left of partner; typical handhold noted as M-L and W-R joined in V-position when applicable.
Some figures require defining inside vs outside couples to form arch and pass under; roles swap on repeat.
